author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Actor Michael Madsen made a huge impact when he appeared as Mr. Blonde in Quentin Tarantino‘s first film, Reservoir Dogs. Madsen continued to collaborate with Tarantino on several additional projects as well as having proven himself as a unique and memorable actor throughout the rest of the 1990s and 2000s. Sadly, Michael Madsen has now [...]

The post ‘Reservoir Dogs’ Actor Michael Madsen Dead At 67 appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Reservoir Dogs’ Actor Michael Madsen Dead At 67
